description: Try our easy to follow Pork Larb Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pork Larb Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Roughly chop coriander leaves and add to pork mixture with mint and dressing. Toss lightly to combine. Serve with lettuce, cucumber, rice and sweet chilli sauce.
Roughly chop coriander leaves and add to pork mixture with mint and dressing. Toss lightly to combine. Serve with lettuce, cucumber, rice and sweet chilli sauce.
